title: Personalized Health Monitoring – Alerts for Abnormal Health Conditions
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to receive alerts for abnormal health conditions so that I can manage my health efficiently and feel secure while living independently.

title: Medication Management Support – Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want automated medication reminders so that I can efficiently manage my health and avoid forgetting my medication schedule.

title: Voice-Activated Emergency Calls
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to make emergency calls using voice commands so that I can quickly get help without struggling with complicated technology.

title: Wellness Activity Suggestions – Personalized Exercise Recommendations
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want personalized exercise recommendations that take into account my mobility issues so that I can maintain my health and independence without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Caregiver Access and Insights – Shared Health Data with Authorized Caregivers
summary: As an older adult, I want to share my health data with my authorized caregivers so that they can help me manage my health efficiently and provide timely assistance when needed.

title: User-Centric Data Privacy Controls – User-Defined Data Sharing Preferences
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to have control over my data sharing preferences so that I can feel secure about my privacy while using ALFRED for my health monitoring and communication needs.

title: Customizable Care Plans
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to have a customizable care plan based on my health needs so that I can efficiently manage my health and receive timely reminders for my medication and appointments.

title: Family Communication Support – Facilitation of Family Group Messages
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to easily send and receive group messages to my family so that I can stay connected with them and reduce feelings of isolation.
